"Oh. Hey.": "Hey, pretty weird place to run into each other, huh?"
"What are you doing here?"
"Why're you with Guren?"
"I heard this Plant was pretty similar to the one we've got in Maqaad."
"I just wanted to confirm it with my own eyes."
"I heard this Plant was pretty similar to the Maqaad facility in Retem."
"I asked Guren to show me the way."
"This place certainly does resemble Maqaad."
"I heard this from Ilma, but..."

"According to the Lecielans, there are
Plants like this all over the place."
"All over the place?"
"Even beyond the sea?"
"Not just on this land we call Halpha."
"They're even out beyond the sea."
"Yeah. Exactly."

"The western shoreline of Aelio sees a lot of enemy encounters.
That's why Aelio Town was so important."

"Could there be a Plant
off in the distant sea?"
"There is that possibility."

"They say most of them are no longer functional,
but it's not like the Lecielans have all the answers."
"Is there a way to stop the DOLLS production lines?"
"Is there a way to control these facilities?"
"No, there's been no new information regarding that."

"So even with the Lecielan's intel,
our situation hasn't changed."

"All we've really learned is that there's currently
no way to stop more DOLLS from being produced."

"Aye. There's nothing for it
but to stay calm and keep looking."
